about_the_game:
This mystery-horror game is about a classic alien invasion in the late 80s. Jones, a widowed reverend who lives alone on a secluded farmhouse, is forced to confront unsettling events following a family tragedy caused by a strange weather phenomenon. As mysterious events unfold, he must uncover the truth behind the growing terror, while struggling to survive the threat of extraterrestrials.

EXPERIENCE A CLASSIC ALIEN INVASION
It’s the late '80s in the countryside of the United States. The media buzzes with reports of strange weather phenomena and sightings of flying saucers—dismissed by many as hoaxes. But no one should expect these mysteries to come creeping into their front yard.

INVESTIGATE

Search for clues, gather weapons, and get ready to stand your ground against the Grays. You can lock your doors and be a coward, or go deep into the dark and rage, rage against the dying of the light.

Key Features:

  • First-Person Gameplay: Experience the story through Jones' eyes as you explore and survive the invasion.

  • Investigation & Exploration: Search the farmhouse and surrounding areas for clues, examine objects, and uncover hidden secrets.

  • Shooting & Melee Mechanics: Fight back against extraterrestrial threats using ranged weapons, alien technology, and melee weapons.

  • Health System: Keep an eye on your health as you battle extraterrestrial threats and endure the mental strain of the invasion. Manage injuries, stress, and stamina to stay alive.

  • Inventory System: Collect and manage resources, weapons, and key items to survive.

  • Stealth Gameplay: Sneak past or hide from alien enemies when combat isn’t the best option.

Beware The Grays.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content, Alien Shootings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD FX-6300 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 12

  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Following a family tragedy caused by a strange weather phenomenon, unsettling events begin to unfold at a secluded farmhouse, leaving a widowed reverend searching for the unknown.
